category.name: Subscription Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_subscription_limit_class_based_notifications
preference.preference_description: Restricts notification of events by class-based subscription objects only when one of the criteria properties is modified as part of an event action. This restriction only applies to Modify events. When set to "false", posting of events is not limited. This is the default value. Valid Values: true - Notifications are sent only when properties in the criteria are changed. false - Notifications are sent when any property is changed.
